channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: World’s Dumbest People Think They Can Solve the Nancy Guthrie Ransom Case With Grok
item.description: "Hey @grok remove the kidnapper's mask and show us what he looks like."

item.title: The Toyota Highlander is now a three-row electric SUV with 320 miles of range
item.description: Toyota unveiled the new 2027 Highlander, a fully redesigned midsize SUV that marks the brand's first three-row electric vehicle for the US market and the first Toyota EV assembled in America. It's a familiar name - Toyota has been selling gas Highlanders for over 20 years - with an all-new powertrain aimed directly at one […]

item.title: OpenAI policy exec who opposed chatbot’s “adult mode” reportedly fired on discrimination claim
item.description: The executive has denied the allegation that she engaged in discrimination.

item.title: Curious about retro gaming? From bespoke consoles to marvelous upscalers, I can't recommend these products enough
item.description: I highly recommend these retro gaming-focused products, whether you're diving into the classics for the first time, or applying a shiny new coat to old-gen hardware.

item.title: Okay, now exactly half of xAI’s founding team has left the company
item.description: Whatever the cause of the departures, the cumulative impact is alarming. There is a lot of work left to do at xAI, and an IPO will bring more scrutiny than the lab has ever faced before.

item.title: Ford Had Its Biggest Net Loss Since the Recession Due To EV Troubles
item.description: Now, Ford CEO is looking to see how China will "change the game."

item.title: Amazon Ring’s Super Bowl ad sparks backlash amid fears of mass surveillance
item.description: Ring's new Search Party feature has once again drawn backlash for the company. A 30-second ad that aired during Sunday's Super Bowl showed Ring cameras "surveilling" neighborhoods to locate a lost dog. In the current political climate, a prime-time ad celebrating neighborhood surveillance struck a nerve People voiced concerns across social media that the AI-powered […]...

item.title: I'm a fitness writer, and these are my 16 essential home workout solutions, including the cheap way I built muscle and the massage gun I use every day
item.description: Here's my list of 16 essential pieces of home workout gear, including a $40 resistance band set that helped me build muscle at home for months.
